subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
organizations: United States Amateur Public Links Championship
lead_paragraph: Jack Newman, a soon-to-be junior at Michigan State, beat John Chin 5 and 3 in the 36-hole final of the United States Amateur Public Links Championship in Aurora, Colo. Newman earned the traditional invitation into the field for next year’s Masters. “I had that on my mind all day,” he said.
snippet: Jack Newman, a soon-to-be junior at Michigan State, beat John Chin 5 and 3 in the 36-hole final of the United States Amateur Public Links Championship in Aurora, Colo. Newman earned the traditional invitation into the field for next year’s Masters....
